rootNodes.label: Upstream Inputs
rootNodes.description: Raw data, securities, and market inputs that feed the investment process

subNodes.label: Equity Issuers
subNodes.description: Public companies issuing stock via exchanges

subNodes.label: Debt Issuers
subNodes.description: Governments and corporations issuing bonds and notes

subNodes.label: Primary Markets
subNodes.description: IPO and new bond issuance processes via investment bank underwriting

subNodes.label: Index Providers
subNodes.description: S&P, MSCI, FTSE — create market indices used for benchmarking

subNodes.label: Ratings Agencies
subNodes.description: Moody's, S&P, Fitch — provide credit ratings on issuers

subNodes.label: Market Data Vendors
subNodes.description: Bloomberg, Reuters, Refinitiv — financial data and analysis providers

subNodes.label: Underwriters
subNodes.description: Investment banks underwriting new stock or bond issues

subNodes.label: Economic Data
subNodes.description: Central bank reports, GDP data, CPI, market indicators

subNodes.label: Corporate Filings
subNodes.description: 10-K, 10-Q, prospectuses, SEC EDGAR filings feeding analysis

rootNodes.label: Product Planning
rootNodes.description: Strategic incubation and product design phase

subNodes.label: Product Sponsor
subNodes.description: ETF Issuer or fund sponsor — strategic architect of the product

subNodes.label: Competitor Analysis
subNodes.description: Evaluating market gaps and optimal pricing structures

subNodes.label: Economic Pro Forma
subNodes.description: Projecting revenue based on anticipated AUM and expense ratios

subNodes.label: Board of Trustees
subNodes.description: Ultimate authority to approve fund launch and ongoing oversight

subNodes.label: Prospectus Drafting
subNodes.description: Preparing SEC Form N-1A disclosure document

subNodes.label: Regulatory Liaison
subNodes.description: Interacting with SEC for filing feedback and compliance

subNodes.label: XBRL Data Tagging
subNodes.description: Standardized tagging for regulatory disclosure processing

subNodes.label: Marketing Consultant
subNodes.description: Strategy to reach target investors — websites, factsheets, sales materials

rootNodes.label: Core Investment Process
rootNodes.description: Front office functions driving investment performance

subNodes.label: Portfolio Management
subNodes.description: Selecting and overseeing mix of investments to meet fund objectives

subNodes.label: Investment Research
subNodes.description: Equity/credit analysts researching companies and industries

subNodes.label: Asset Allocation
subNodes.description: Deciding how to spread assets across equity, bond, cash, alternatives

subNodes.label: Strategy Development
subNodes.description: Setting investment strategy — growth, value, passive, active, thematic

subNodes.label: Trading Desk
subNodes.description: Executing buy/sell orders on exchanges or OTC markets

subNodes.label: Risk Management
subNodes.description: VaR, stress tests, scenario analysis, hedging portfolio risks

subNodes.label: Compliance Monitoring
subNodes.description: Ensuring adherence to investment mandate and regulatory limits

subNodes.label: Fund Accounting
subNodes.description: Calculating NAV, performance metrics, bookkeeping

rootNodes.label: Primary Market Mechanism
rootNodes.description: Creation and redemption engine — unique to ETFs and pooled vehicles

subNodes.label: Authorized Participant
subNodes.description: Large financial institution permitted to transact directly with the fund

subNodes.label: Creation Unit
subNodes.description: Large blocks of 10K-100K shares created in exchange for basket of securities

subNodes.label: Redemption Basket
subNodes.description: In-kind redemption process returning underlying securities

subNodes.label: Arbitrage Mechanism
subNodes.description: Keeps ETF price aligned with NAV through AP activity

subNodes.label: Tax Efficiency
subNodes.description: In-kind transactions avoid realizing capital gains

rootNodes.label: Operations & Processing
rootNodes.description: Trade lifecycle — order management through settlement

subNodes.label: Order Management
subNodes.description: OMS for routing, confirming, and tracking trade orders

subNodes.label: Trade Execution
subNodes.description: Processing orders through brokers or electronic platforms

subNodes.label: Clearing & Settlement
subNodes.description: Matching and finalizing trades — cash and securities exchange

subNodes.label: NAV Calculation
subNodes.description: Daily computation of Net Asset Value per share

subNodes.label: Reconciliation
subNodes.description: Matching positions and transactions across systems

subNodes.label: Tax Reporting
subNodes.description: Preparing 1099-DIV, K-1s, IRS filings for investors

subNodes.label: N-PORT/N-CEN Filings
subNodes.description: Ongoing regulatory filings for liquidity assessment

rootNodes.label: Distribution
rootNodes.description: Channels through which investment products reach investors

subNodes.label: Broker-Dealers
subNodes.description: Financial intermediaries selling fund shares to clients

subNodes.label: Financial Advisors
subNodes.description: Professionals recommending the fund to their clients

subNodes.label: Online Platforms
subNodes.description: Retail brokerage platforms — Schwab, Fidelity, Robinhood

subNodes.label: Institutional Sales
subNodes.description: Marketing to pension funds, endowments, sovereign wealth funds

subNodes.label: Retirement Providers
subNodes.description: 401(k)/IRA plan sponsors including the fund in offerings

subNodes.label: Marketing & PR
subNodes.description: Materials, campaigns, brand building to attract investors

subNodes.label: Investor Relations
subNodes.description: Communications with current and prospective investors

subNodes.label: Cross-Border Distribution
subNodes.description: International partners or fund wrappers for global access

subNodes.label: Distributor
subNodes.description: Legal underwriter facilitating fund-to-AP and fund-to-market relationship

rootNodes.label: Secondary Market
rootNodes.description: Where the majority of investor trading activity occurs

subNodes.label: Market Makers
subNodes.description: Dealers posting continuous bid/ask prices on exchanges

subNodes.label: Exchanges
subNodes.description: NYSE, NASDAQ, CBOE — where ETFs and securities trade

subNodes.label: Liquidity Providers
subNodes.description: HFT firms providing depth to the order book

subNodes.label: Clearing House
subNodes.description: Central counterparty ensuring trade settlement — DTCC, OCC

subNodes.label: Retail Investors
subNodes.description: Individual end-investors buying through accounts or retirement plans

subNodes.label: Institutional Investors
subNodes.description: Pension funds, insurance companies, endowments investing large sums

subNodes.label: Plan Sponsors
subNodes.description: Employers offering the fund in retirement/benefit plans

subNodes.label: Registered Investment Advisers
subNodes.description: Firms managing money for clients that allocate to this fund

subNodes.label: Customer Portal
subNodes.description: Online account access, statements, performance reporting

rootNodes.label: Support & Operations
rootNodes.description: Back-office infrastructure keeping the fund running

subNodes.label: Custodian Bank
subNodes.description: Holding fund assets in custody — State Street, BNY Mellon, JPMorgan

subNodes.label: Transfer Agent
subNodes.description: Shareholder recordkeeping, share issuance and redemption

subNodes.label: Fund Administrator
subNodes.description: Third-party handling NAV calculation, statements, reporting

subNodes.label: External Auditor
subNodes.description: Verifying fund financial statements — Big Four firms

subNodes.label: Legal Counsel
subNodes.description: In-house or external counsel for contracts and regulation

subNodes.label: IT & Infrastructure
subNodes.description: Servers, networks, trading systems maintenance

subNodes.label: HR & Finance
subNodes.description: Internal staff support, budgeting, payroll

subNodes.label: Client Relationship Mgmt
subNodes.description: CRM software and teams handling investor inquiries

rootNodes.label: Regulation & Standards
rootNodes.description: Legal and regulatory framework governing investment products

subNodes.label: SEC
subNodes.description: Securities & Exchange Commission — federal securities regulator

subNodes.label: FINRA
subNodes.description: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority — broker-dealer oversight

subNodes.label: Investment Company Act
subNodes.description: 1940 Act regulating mutual funds and requiring disclosures

subNodes.label: Securities Acts
subNodes.description: 1933/1934 Acts governing registration and trading

subNodes.label: AML / KYC
subNodes.description: Anti-money laundering and Know Your Customer requirements

subNodes.label: Data Privacy
subNodes.description: GDPR, CCPA — investor data protection regulations

subNodes.label: Accounting Standards
subNodes.description: GAAP/IFRS standards for financial reporting

subNodes.label: MiFID II
subNodes.description: European Markets in Financial Instruments Directive

subNodes.label: Dodd-Frank Act
subNodes.description: Post-2008 U.S. financial regulation reform

rootNodes.label: Technology Stack
rootNodes.description: Digital nervous system underpinning investment operations

subNodes.label: Portfolio Mgmt System
subNodes.description: Real-time holdings, analytics, rebalancing — BlackRock Aladdin, FactSet

subNodes.label: Order Mgmt System
subNodes.description: Centralizes trade orders, lifecycle tracking, pre-trade compliance

subNodes.label: Execution Mgmt System
subNodes.description: High-speed connectivity to trading venues, algorithmic routing

subNodes.label: FIX Protocol
subNodes.description: Universal standard for electronic trading communication

subNodes.label: Market Data APIs
subNodes.description: Real-time price and news feeds — Bloomberg, Reuters terminals

subNodes.label: Risk Analytics Tools
subNodes.description: Stress testing, VaR calculation, scenario analysis platforms

subNodes.label: CRM System
subNodes.description: Salesforce, Dynamics — managing investor contacts and communications

subNodes.label: Client Portals
subNodes.description: Secure web portals for investor access and reporting

subNodes.label: Cloud Services
subNodes.description: AWS, Azure, GCP — scalable infrastructure

subNodes.label: Cybersecurity
subNodes.description: Threat protection, encryption, SOC compliance, SEC Rule 38a-2

subNodes.label: Blockchain / DLT
subNodes.description: Emerging ledger technology for settlement and custody

rootNodes.label: Key Roles
rootNodes.description: People who drive the investment process

subNodes.label: Portfolio Manager
subNodes.description: Makes investment decisions and asset allocation

subNodes.label: Research Analyst
subNodes.description: Analyzes securities and markets to support PM

subNodes.label: Trader
subNodes.description: Executes trades on exchanges or OTC markets

subNodes.label: Risk Manager
subNodes.description: Monitors portfolio risk and implements hedges

subNodes.label: Compliance Officer
subNodes.description: Ensures all activities meet regulatory requirements

subNodes.label: Fund Accountant
subNodes.description: Handles accounting, NAV calculations, financial records

subNodes.label: Sales Representative
subNodes.description: Sells the fund and builds distribution channels

subNodes.label: Chief Investment Officer
subNodes.description: Sets overall investment strategy and risk appetite

subNodes.label: Chief Operating Officer
subNodes.description: Oversees operations and back-office processes

subNodes.label: Quant / Data Scientist
subNodes.description: Builds algorithms and models for trading and analytics

rootNodes.label: Alternative Assets
rootNodes.description: Non-traditional investment classes expanding the value chain

subNodes.label: Private Equity
subNodes.description: Investments in non-public companies — buyouts, growth capital

subNodes.label: Venture Capital
subNodes.description: Early-stage company investments — seed, Series A-D

subNodes.label: Private Credit
subNodes.description: Direct lending without bank intermediary

subNodes.label: Real Estate
subNodes.description: REITs, direct property investment, commercial real estate

subNodes.label: Infrastructure
subNodes.description: Airports, toll roads, utilities — essential services investing

subNodes.label: Commodities
subNodes.description: Gold, oil, agricultural products — supply and demand driven

subNodes.label: Digital Assets
subNodes.description: Crypto, tokenized assets, digital custody solutions

subNodes.label: Hedge Funds
subNodes.description: Long/short, event-driven, macro strategies — alternative vehicles

subNodes.label: Liquid Alternatives
subNodes.description: Mutual fund wrappers providing hedge-fund-like strategies with daily liquidity

rootNodes.label: ESG & Stewardship
rootNodes.description: Environmental, Social, and Governance integration into investing

subNodes.label: ESG Frameworks
subNodes.description: GRI, TCFD, SASB — sustainability disclosure standards

subNodes.label: ESG Rating Agencies
subNodes.description: MSCI ESG, Sustainalytics — scoring and assessments

subNodes.label: Proxy Advisory
subNodes.description: ISS, Glass Lewis — voting recommendations and stewardship

subNodes.label: Impact Assessment
subNodes.description: Measuring real-world outcomes of ESG-aligned investments

subNodes.label: ESG Compliance
subNodes.description: SFDR, EU Taxonomy, CSRD — mandatory sustainability reporting

rootNodes.label: Private Wealth & Estate
rootNodes.description: Individualized planning and fiduciary services for end investors

subNodes.label: Wealth Manager
subNodes.description: Holistic financial planning integrating investments, tax, estate

subNodes.label: Estate Planning
subNodes.description: Wills, trusts, beneficiary designations

subNodes.label: Trust Structures
subNodes.description: Revocable, irrevocable, charitable remainder trusts

subNodes.label: Revocable Trust
subNodes.description: Client maintains control during lifetime

subNodes.label: Irrevocable Trust
subNodes.description: Tax advantages and creditor protection

subNodes.label: Charitable Trust
subNodes.description: CRTs and donor-advised funds

subNodes.label: Tax Optimization
subNodes.description: Tax-loss harvesting, asset location, Roth conversions

subNodes.label: Fiduciary Services
subNodes.description: Trustee, executor, power of attorney, healthcare proxy

rootNodes.label: Systemic Oversight
rootNodes.description: Macro-level monitoring and stability of the financial system

subNodes.label: FSOC
subNodes.description: Financial Stability Oversight Council — systemic risk monitoring

subNodes.label: OFR
subNodes.description: Office of Financial Research — mapping financial interdependencies

subNodes.label: Federal Reserve
subNodes.description: Interest rate policy, monetary stability, bank supervision

subNodes.label: FDIC
subNodes.description: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation — deposit protection

subNodes.label: CFTC
subNodes.description: Commodity Futures Trading Commission — derivatives oversight

subNodes.label: SEC Oversight
subNodes.description: Securities market regulation, investor protection mandates
